remarks: Closure of a finite product of complex numbers.  A version of ~ fprodcl using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
fprodclf.kph $e |- F/ k ph $.
fprodclf.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fprodclf.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fprodclf $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A B e. CC ) $.
$d A k $.
